name: OPAF
description:
A fighting game made by a team of primarily STDev members for a 48-hour Game Jam in September 2014. The theme was "Magic" and the game was made in Game Maker. Enjoy a single player survival mode in which you must fly around and avoid the spells of an evil wizard or play your friends in a best 3 out of 5 wizard duel!

Instructions:

  • You will need one or two controllers to play.
  • Press A to Begin.
  • To play single player survival mode
    • Press Y. Use left joystick to avoid enemy attacks.
  • To play multiplayer,
    • Select your spells with left and right trigger. Select your bullet fire rate with right joystick.
    • Click A to confirm when ready. Using left joystick to move, right joystick to fire bullets, and the triggers to fire spells. Beat your opponent in a best 3 out of 5 wizard fighting match!
